reviewText: A VERY HEART WARMING AND TOUCHING STORY OF A CHILD FROM THE ORPHANAGE TO BE THEN NEGLECTED AND ABUSED  YET READY TO SACRIFICE HER OWN LIFE TOO  WITH HER TRAPPED STEP MOM TO THE ON COMING TRAIN..SONGS,MUSIC,FOLK DANCES,CINEMATOGRAPHY AND CHARACTERS ARE AT THEIR BEST AS DAVID AS USUAL ALSO BRINGS OUT HIS HUMOUR NOW AND THEN. OTHER MOVIES BY DAVID ARE BOOT POLISH AND NANA PALISHKER.
